name: Pin Puck (itch)
description:
Basics:

Pin Puck is a high speed local multiplayer ice hockey inspired game for 2 - 4 players. The aim is simple: sink the puck into your opponent’s goals to score.

The 'Pin'

The curves on the front and sides of the Pin make manoeuvring the puck around a difficult task. Rather than going directly for the puck, its often much more effective to control the puck from the side in a circular motion. This makes the game a little difficult to begin with, but allows for some cool tricks later on.

Features:
  • Battle it out in 4 different arenas
  • Play 1v1, 2v1 or 2v2 matches
  • Set a score target or time limit to decide the winner

Supported Controllers:

Pin Puck supports a variety of popular game controllers, including:

  • Xbox 360 Controller
  • Xbox One Controller
  • Sony Dualshock 4
  • Logitech F310
  • Logitech F710
  • Nintendo Switch Pro Controller
  • Steam Controller
